word: It is not enough to preach to men; we must pray with them and for them; we must not hold ourselves coldly aloof from them, but come in sympathy close to the souls we wish to save, visit and converse with them. The minister who conducts the work outside the pulpit in a proper manner will  accomplish tenfold more than he who confines his labor to the desk. --Review and Herald, Aug. 8, 1878.
